item.description:
I got a lot of positive feedback last time we went to support Bob Raymond at the Space in Hamden, so I am pleased to announce that he is playing there again on Sunday Nov. 4th.  His slot will be sometime between 6:30 - 8:30 p.m.  But there is a new band taking the stage every 20 minutes, and lot of fun, snacks, and people watching to keep you busy!

When you get to the venue, PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU TELL THE PERSON WHO SELLS THE TIX THAT YOU ARE HERE FOR BOB RAYMOND>  Thank you!

 

The info is all here, and you can get your discounted advance tics here:

http://www.thespacect.com/main/?s=raymond&cat=5

From the website:

Alex and Anna, Bob Raymond, The Blacksheep Collective, Laura Mustard, Dave Kardas Band & Guests

  • Doors: 6:30PM
  • Cost: $13.00
  • Advanced: $11.00
item.name: Want some more Space? Bob Raymond does!
